Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
25.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
13.04.2011 GB SCR16261 Replaced the GB002 by the GB902
01.09.2008 SH SCR13915 Replaced LimitsAndConc client fields by Limit fields
09.07.2008 SH SCR13754 Changed calc of v.Sales and v.OpenPos
14.02.2008 SH SCR10872 Extended selection of DEBC with "Row present in
INFO_SOURCE where INFS_CODE = DEBC_REINSURANCECODE"
14.05.2007 SH SCR12527 Changed test DEBC_REINSURANCELIMEXPIRY > PI.DATE
to be now >= bom(PI.DATE)
15.04.2004 SH SCR5991 BXA310D Extended logic for calc "monthly turnover" with
- INFS_REPORTSALESGROSS, see SCR for details
05.03.2004 SH SCR5564 Changed argument list for BXA900, see SCR for details
09.02.2004 SH SCR5378 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ATTACHMENT_NAME (skip)
14.01.2003 SH SCR5068 Fixed problem with picture of v.STARTDATE
29.12.2003 SH SCR5068 Added writing of sub totals per client and perform
- a page skip per distinct client
-- Working fields
-- Totals per DEBC_CLNTNO
-- Totals per XML file
-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- needed for errorhandling
-- Uses for triggering XML
======= Build directories for TEMPLATES and OUTPUTDIRECTORIES =========
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
-- Directory for templates
-- Directory for temporary XML Files
-- Build FileNames for Templates
-- 1. STEP --> Check for existing Template (s)
-- 2. STEP --> Check for existing TempDirectory
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
-- Prepare PI.DATE
-- Store user language, Report has to be printed in INFS_LANGUAGE
-- produce XML Files
-- See special SORT, regarding to the SPECS
-- Text fields
.... Headings for detail lines
.... Headings for total lines per DEBC_CLNTNO
.... Headings for total lines per DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY
.... Headings for total lines of all rows per DEBC_REINSURANCECODE
-- Working fields
-- Set report language
-- Initialize virtuals
-- Set / Reset virtuals
-- Store row to REPORT_ARCHIVE
-- Build filename for temporary XML Files
-- Build final filename for the XML File
-- Write XML HEADER and XML FOOTER
-- Write 'SCI' HEADER
-- Write 'SCI' FOOTER only once, the same for all XML files
-- Write SubTotals per country and total
-- Produce final XML-File
-- Copy final XML File to tamino queue
-- Copy of final XML File failed
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Delete partial XML files
-- Only if FinalFile was copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523
-- Set language back to user language
-- Reset virtuals
-- Calculate totals over all rows for the same DEBC_REINSURANCECODE
-- has to be printed at the end of the XML file
- Write only sub totals per client if detail rows per client were written to XML
-- Write Sub-Totals per DEBC_CLNTNO to XML
-- If Subtotals does not fit on the current page, write Subtotals to the next
-- page
-- Close CDATA-Section of previous page, Set a <page-skip/> to produce a new pag
-- New page --> add 1
-- New page --> begin with 1 for new page
-- Open CDATA-Section of the new page and print Pageheader and Columnheader
-- informations
-- Start new page if client changed, see also arguments for previous CallTask
-- Reset virtuals
-- Do not write rows to XML, if sales and open positions both 0
-- Write BXA310C Header line, only one at the beginning of an new client
-- Calculate totals per DEBC_CLNTNO
.... Calculate MONTHLY_TURNOVER ( = sales)
.... Calculate OPEN_POSITIONS
-- Calculate totals per DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY
-- Use special counter per page, counter(1) can not be used because it's the
-- counter over all rows which have to be printed
-- Second and following pages
-- Close CDATA-Section of previous page, Set a <page-skip/> to produce a new pag
-- New page --> add 1
-- New page --> begin with 1 for new page
-- Open CDATA-Section of the new page and print Pageheader and Columnheader
-- informations
-- Don't change the sequence of the output forms, because the parent task
-- sometimes will be called this task to print more than one output form
-- Write Subtotals per client
-- Write one total line for all clients and countries at the end of XML
-- Begin new page if current page is full
(-3) because the total line with 3 lines has to be also printed
-- Close CDATA-Section of previous page, Set a <page-skip/> to produce a new pag
-- New page --> add 1
-- New page --> begin with 1 for new page
-- Open CDATA-Section of the new page and print Pageheader and Columnheader
-- informations

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(DCMO_TOTASALESDEBTNOTES) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(DCMO_TOTASALESCREDNOTES) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(DCMO_BALANCE) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/DEBC, :1/DCMO left outer join :1/DEBH a on a.DEBH_NO = :2 join :1/DEBH b on (b.DEBH_NO = a.DEBH_NO and a.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH = 0) or (a.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH > 0 and a.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH = b.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH and b.DEBH_DATDELETED is null) join :1/CLNT on CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO = :3 and CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO = :4 where DEBC_DEBH = b.DEBH_NO and DEBC_DATDELETED is null and DEBC_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBC_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and DCMO_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and DCMO_YEAR = :5 and DCMO_MONTH = :6 and DCMO_CURRENCY = ':7' for fetch only
